text: thanks, in fact I suspected that I should have used another field
Is there any way to change the global theme settings on a page-by-page basis? i.e. modify/override them only for a single page?
Also, is there any way to remove the default Barricade theme off the ‘Your themes’ tab? :thinking_face:

no, but you can create a page settings module and build logic to accept either page settings module parameters or theme parameters. Ex:
```{{ content.widgets.page_settings.body.parameter || theme.parameter }}```
